snippet.title: Ninja Five-O | Pre-Order Trailer
snippet.description:
Ninja Five-O, the action-packed platformer originally released on the GameBoy Advance, is making a heroic return to modern-day consoles February 25!  

Detective Joe Osugi must utilize a wide variety of ninja skills to uphold justice and protect the city of Zinpangu. Solve treacherous crimes such as bank heists and hijackings. Use unique Ninjutsu moves and take down the evil Mad Mask bosses. 

For more information follow KONAMI on social media:

· https://www.instagram.com/konami/
· https://www.facebook.com/konami/
· https://twitter.com/Konami
· https://www.tiktok.com/@konami_en
· https://www.threads.net/@konami

Official website: https://www.konami.com/games/ninjafiveo/
